Uses of AbstractControllerConnectPolicy in org.objectweb.cjdbc.driver.connectpolicy
 

Subclasses of AbstractControllerConnectPolicy in org.objectweb.cjdbc.driver.connectpolicy
 class OrderedConnectPolicy
          This class defines an OrderedConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
 class PreferredListConnectPolicy
          This class defines a PreferredListConnectPolicy
 class RandomConnectPolicy
          This class defines a RandomConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
 class RoundRobinConnectPolicy
          This class defines a RoundRobinConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
 class SingleConnectPolicy
          This class defines a SingleConnectPolicy used when a C-JDBC URL only contains one controller.
